item.title: Deltascape help!
item.dc:creator: @pwnedurmom pwnedurmom
item.description:
@pwnedurmom wrote:

i see your problem… you didn’t fully copy my last code…

        if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 ) {
			String text = command.substring(5);
		yell(playerName +" - " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}

item.title: Deltascape help!
item.dc:creator: @ash20o8 ash20o8
item.description:
@ash20o8 wrote:

[quote=“pwnedurmom, post:10, topic:238606”]sorry guys, but on deltascape >= 2 means players rights 3 so >=0 would be for mods. so delete the player rights… your command should be like this…

if (command.startsWith("message") && command.length() > 7) {
         String text = command.substring(7);
            yell("[ "+playerName+" ]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}

Or, if you want the classic ::yell heres that command.

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) {
         String text = command.substring(5);
            yell("[ "+playerName+" ]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}

There should be no errors. But if their are, post them. I’ll fix if needed.[/quote]

1 error

if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 7 {

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape help!
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

[quote=“pwnedurmom, post:10, topic:238606”]sorry guys, but on deltascape >= 2 means players rights 3 so >=0 would be for mods. so delete the player rights… your command should be like this…

if (command.startsWith("message") && command.length() > 7) {
         String text = command.substring(7);
            yell("[ "+playerName+" ]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}

Or, if you want the classic ::yell heres that command.

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) {
         String text = command.substring(5);
            yell("[ "+playerName+" ]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}

There should be no errors. But if their are, post them. I’ll fix if needed.[/quote]
How the funk is is 3? Unless everyone starts at 1, you are wrong…

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape help!
item.dc:creator: @pwnedurmom pwnedurmom
item.description:
@pwnedurmom wrote:

sorry guys, but on deltascape >= 2 means players rights 3 so >=0 would be for mods. so delete the player rights… your command should be like this…

if (command.startsWith("message") && command.length() > 7) {
         String text = command.substring(7);
            yell("[ "+playerName+" ]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}

Or, if you want the classic ::yell heres that command.

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) {
         String text = command.substring(5);
            yell("[ "+playerName+" ]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}

There should be no errors. But if their are, post them. I’ll fix if needed.

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape help!
item.dc:creator: @ash20o8 ash20o8
item.description:
@ash20o8 wrote:

[quote=“hasumon, post:8, topic:238606”][quote author=kihomura link=topic=314869.msg2503489#msg2503489 date=1224803400]

I changed the

&& playerRights >= 0) {

Because you had it set to playerRights 2, which is for Administrator+

Why the funk do you need playerrights then???

…That is a good question.

Just delete the playerRights, Lol.
[/quote]
hasumon = 1
kihomura = 0

I changed the

&& playerRights >= 0) {

Because you had it set to playerRights 2, which is for Administrator+

Why the funk do you need playerrights then???

still doesent work

Type it like “::message hi im a nub”[/quote]

still doesent work :(

item.title: Deltascape help!
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

if (command.startsWith("message") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 0) { String text = command.substring(7); yell("[ "+playerName+" ]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

item.title: Deltascape help!
item.dc:creator: @ash20o8 ash20o8
item.description:
@ash20o8 wrote:

i need a lil help…

i have allready got ::message but how can i put it so every1 can use it?

this is the code!

if (command.startsWith(“message”) && command.length() > 7 && playerRights > 2) {
String text = command.substring(7);
yell("[ “+playerName+” ]: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

Read full topic
